clinical_study.brief_title: Trends Over Time (1990-2010) of Diarrhoea-related Hospitalizations and Deaths in Children < 5 Years of Age in Brazil
clinical_study.official_title: Time Trend Analysis of Diarrhea-related Hospitalizations and Deaths in Children < 5 Years of Age in Brazil, 1990-2010

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims at collecting data to obtain baseline incidence and monitor trends over time in hospitalizations and deaths from all cause gastroenteritis in children <5 years of age, before and after implementation of Rotarix™ universal mass vaccination in Brazil.

detailed_description.textblock: In this study baseline gastroenteritis related hospital discharges and mortality data from the Ministry of Health databases (DATASUS) will be compared to the current data after introduction of Rotarix™.

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related hospital discharges and deaths
primary_outcome.time_frame: In post vaccine introduction period compared to pre-vaccination period (gastroenteritis related hospital discharges from 1998 to 2010, gastroenteritis related deaths from 1990 to 2009)

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related hospital discharges and hospital deaths by year, region and age groups
Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related deaths by year, region and age groups

intervention.description: Review and collect data from database

study_pop.textblock: All children <5 years of age being hospitalized due to gastroenteritis between 1998 and 2010 and deceased due to gastroenteritis between 1990 and 2009 in Brazil.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Gastroenteritis associated hospital discharges and gastroenteritis related deaths occurring in children <5 years of age during the period analyzed and registered in the DATASUS databases will be collected for the study
Exclusion Criteria:
